name: Samurai Dual
description:
Click to dash.  Dash through an enemy to attack.

Jam Theme: Dual purpose design

  • Your only source of movement is also your only attack
  • You have 2 charges. Dashing or getting hit removes a charge. If you have no charges, you cannot dash and taking another hit kills you. Charges replenish when hitting an enemy or after a 2 second delay.
  • Two enemy types, each with a tougher second form encountered in later waves.
